item.title: Another Problem
item.dc:creator: @Shadower Shadower
item.description:
@Shadower wrote:

Sure

[code]{
Please change function Donotspamsomuch(the digit 6 to whatever digit you want, for now it is currently 6 seconds long
for the script to run
}

program ClickOnTheNudgeButton;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

var
NudgeButton, x, y, MyMark : Integer;

Procedure MyMarking;
begin
MarkTime(MyMark);
SendKeys(‘Created By InsertNameHere,Nudging you to death.’+ chr(13));
Wait(1000+ Random(1000));
end;

function Donotspamsomuch: boolean;
begin
if TimeFromMark(MyMark) > (1* 6* 1000) then //We set MyMark before hand right?
begin
Result := True; //this IS a boolean
end;
end;

Procedure Clickonnudge;
begin
NudgeButton:=DTMFromString(‘78DA637462646078CD80027EBCF000D38C503’ +
‘EA32390F51955CDFB1FFF51D5F803596F51D5BCFD8EA60664D723’ +
‘5435BFFFA2A93103B25EA2AAF9F20B4D8D2590F511CD2E74F7F80’ +
‘2594F50D5FCFC83A6C68A08356E44F8DD0FC87A85AA46CFBF1F33’ +
‘7C9EA1AAF9FE1BCD1C774CF73CB97701558D0DA69AD8B2E5286A0’ +
‘0DC343102’);
if(findDTM(NudgeButton, x, y, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2))then
begin
repeat
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, true);
until(Donotspamsomuch = True);
end;
end;

Procedure Failsafe;
begin
if(keydown(GetKeyCode(Chr(13))))then
begin
Writeln(’ Script Terminated’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

begin
SetupSRL
ActivateClient;
MyMarking;
ClickonNudge; // No loop here because the procedure carries on until Donotspamsomuch is true
Repeat
Failsafe;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Another Problem
item.dc:creator: @Shadower Shadower
item.description:
@Shadower wrote:

I want to make a failsafe, which is if the key ‘Enter’ is pressed, the current script will terminate.
I came up with this

procedure failsafe;
begin
  if(keydown(13))then
  begin
     Writeln('Script has been Terminated');
     TerminateScript;
  end;
end;

There is a problem with

  if(keydown(13))then

It gives a type mismatch error. How do I solve this, and thanks in advance.

Read full topic
